attributes.action: To ensure and rectify current laws to allow discrimination of race/age/sex to be equal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where the race/sex/age attack on all forms allows all citizens White/Black Male/Female Old/young to prove that race/age/sex was a pivotal role in an attack with sufficient evidence, and/or to further change current laws to offer more equality to all races of the UK in the form of Housing, Benefits and/or any other non equal areas. As such many deam this as unfair or unequal

rejection.details: Please resubmit in plain and clear English.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
